channel.title: Multidplyr on Mark LeBoeuf
channel.description: Recent content in Multidplyr on Mark LeBoeuf

item.title: Pyspark Tutorial
item.description: Running Spark locally is a great place to start when initially learning. However, it’s more realistic to and actually using it can be challenging. This post will show you how to set up an Amazon EC2 instance and run Pyspark. We’ll do some analysis on historic flights data to see which carriers tend to be the most delayed.

item.title: Two Flavors of Parallel Simulation
item.description: Tired of waiting around for your simulations to finish? Run them in parallel! This post covers two seperate ways to add parallelism to your R code.
